items.sentence: They don\'t want us to see what they\'re doing.
He was kind enough to help me with my homework.
His story wasn\'t appropriate for the occasion.
Tom will be heading back to Boston after lunch.
Tom finally got around to going to the dentist.
Tom had all the tools he needed to do that job.
Tom had difficulty convincing Mary to help him.
Tom believes that life exists on other planets.
Tom doesn\'t need to go if he doesn\'t want to.
I wanted you to see that I\'m not all that bad.
